# Chandra Mohan Portfolio - Development Instructions

This is a Next.js portfolio website for Chandra Mohan, an AI/ML Developer & Mobile App Developer. The project uses TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion for animations.

## Project Structure
- Modern Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling with custom design system
- Framer Motion for smooth animations
- Responsive design following mobile-first approach

## Coding Standards
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Implement proper TypeScript types for all props and data
- Follow Tailwind CSS utility-first approach
- Use semantic HTML elements for accessibility
- Implement smooth animations with Framer Motion
- Ensure responsive design across all screen sizes

## Design System
- Primary colors: Custom teal/cyan gradient (#64ffda)
- Dark theme with navy blue background (#0c1626, #1a2332)
- Typography: Poppins font family
- Spacing: Consistent Tailwind spacing scale
- Components should be reusable and well-structured

## Features to Implement
- Hero section with typing animation
- About section with profile information
- Skills section with categorized technical skills
- Projects showcase with detailed project cards
- Education and certifications sections
- Contact section with social links
- Smooth scrolling navigation
- Interactive animations and hover effects
